name: Showing data model for approval
description: Claude presents data model design and asks if it works - should STOP

transcript.content: Design the data model for the blog system

Here's the proposed data model:

Post (id, title, content, authorId, publishedAt, status)
Comment (id, postId, userId, content, createdAt)
Tag (id, name)
PostTag (postId, tagId)

Does this structure capture all the requirements?
